created_at.description: Timestamp when the integrator was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the integrator was last updated.

walletId.description: Master wallet ID (created automatically with integrator).

apiKey.description: Primary API key (returned only on creation).

primaryAddress.description: Primary wallet address (first address of master wallet).

subOrganizationId.description: Sub-organization ID where the wallet was created

curve.description: Curve type for the cryptographic key

addressFormat.description: Address format for the derived address

accounts.description: Array of account parameters to create in the wallet

addressFormats.description: Array of address formats to create (simplified, auto-derives paths)

mnemonicLength.description: Mnemonic length for the wallet seed phrase (12 or 24)

accounts.description: Array of account parameters to create

addressFormats.description: Array of address formats to create (simplified, auto-derives paths)

protocol.description: Protocol used for the mini app

blockchain_network.description: Blockchain network ID (43114 for Avalanche mainnet)

blockchain_network_destination.description: Destination blockchain network ID (for cross-chain operations)

protocol.description: Protocol used for the mini app

blockchain_network.description: Blockchain network ID (43114 for Avalanche mainnet)

blockchain_network_destination.description: Destination blockchain network ID (for cross-chain operations)

explanation.example: A project that changes the world.
explanation.description: Explanation or pitch of the project.

api_url.description: Public API URL of the project.

explanation.example: A project that changes the world.
explanation.description: Explanation or pitch of the project.

api_url.description: Public API URL of the project.

triggerIds.description: Array of trigger IDs that were searched

events.description: Array of individual events with detailed information

amountIn.description: Raw amount of tokens involved in the swap

logId.description: Event index in the transaction log

priceFound.description: Whether price was found for this token

count.description: Number of occurrences in current period

previous_count.description: Number of occurrences in previous period

tokensWithoutPrice.description: Token addresses that could not be priced

postHogStats.description: PostHog event statistics for this mini app

fees.description: Global fees colected from all the swaps

miniApps.description: Array of mini apps that were searched

globalStats.description: Global onchain metrics for the KOL

id_x.description: Unique X / Ttwitter ID of the user.

address.description: Ethereum wallet address of the user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user onboarded (UUID).

id_mini_app_onboarding.description: ID of the mini app with which the user was onboarded.

twitter_handle.description: Twitter handle of the user onboarded that was sent to the mini-app. sent by by the webhook

id_mini_app.description: ID of the mini app created by the user, can be null if not created. In case user creates a mini app to onboard, this will be the ID of that mini app.

id_user.description: ID of the user onboarded, can be null if not yet created.

id_x.description: Unique X / Twitter ID of the user onboarded.

user_onboarded.description: User onboarded data if available, null otherwise

created.description: Indicates if the user was created (true) or already existed (false)

on_whitelist.description: Indicates if the user is on the whitelist

disabled.description: Indicates if the user is disabled on the whitelist

onboarded.description: Indicates if the user is onboarded

users_onboarded.description: Number of users onboarded by this user

tokenAddress.description: Token contract address (0x0 for native token)

contractAddress.description: Contract address of the mini app

success.description: Whether the contract call was successful

totalMiniApps.description: Total number of mini apps for this KOL

feeBalances.description: Fee balance details for each mini app

data.description: Data of the event or transaction.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the payload was sent in seconds.

icon.description: The icon URL of the Application

sourceChainId.description: The source chain ID for the cross-chain transfer

destinationChainId.description: The destination chain ID for the cross-chain transfer

address.description: The recipient address for the cross-chain transfer

title.description: The name of the blockchain network (e.g., ethereum, polygon).

description.description: The name of the blockchain network (e.g., ethereum, polygon).

icon.description: The Twitter handle of the recipient (without @).

url.description: The name of the blockchain network (e.g., ethereum, polygon).

address.description: The name of the blockchain network (e.g., ethereum, polygon).

chainId.description: The name of the blockchain network (e.g., ethereum, polygon).

userState.description: User state data if userAddress was provided

supplyReserves.description: List of available supply reserves with market data

allMarketsData.description: All markets raw data from AAVE

amount.description: Amount to supply in token units (wei for ETH-like tokens)

message.example: Transaction serialized and ready to be signed
